root.name: Karaoke Revolution
root.description: Soundtrack"Addicted" by Simple Plan"All You Wanted" by Michelle Branch"Are You Happy Now?" by Michelle Branch"Believe" by Cher"Billie Jean" by Michael Jackson"Bizarre Love Triangle" by New Order"Broken Wings" by Mr. Mister"Celebration" by Kool the Gang"Chain of Fools" by Aretha Franklin"Complicated" by Avril Lavigne"Crawling in the Dark" by Hoobastank"Don't Know Why" by Norah Jones"Every Morning" by Sugar Ray"Everything You Want" by Vertical Horizon"Girls Just Want To Have Fun" by Cyndi Lauper"Hey Jealousy" by Gin Blossoms"Hit Me With Your Best Shot" by Pat Benatar"How You Remind Me" by Nickelback"I'm Coming Out" by Diana Ross"It's the End of the World as We Know It (and I Feel Fine)" by R.E.M."Kiss Me" by Sixpence None the Richer"Like a Virgin" by Madonna"Red Red Wine" by UB40"Save Tonight" by Eagle-Eye Cherry"She Talks to Angels" by Black Crowes"Son of a Preacherman" by Dusty Springfield"The Power of Love" by Huey Lewis and the News"Waiting for Tonight" by Jennifer Lopez"When a Man Loves a Woman" by Percy Sledge"Wind Beneath My Wings" by Bette Midler"You Really Got Me" by Van Halen"You're the One That I Want" by John Travolta and Olivia Newton-John"Ladie's Night" by Kool the Gang (Secret Song)"One Week" by Barenaked Ladies (Secret Song)"Science Genius Girl" by Freezepop (Secret Song)"Smooth Criminal" by Alien Ant Farm (Secret Song)
